name: Workflow UI
description: A monorepo containing packages for the Salsify workflow feature set. Uses yarn workspaces to manage multiple packages including @salsify/workflow, @salsify/workflow-ui, @salsify/workflow-task-runtime, and @salsify/workflow-exclaim-components. The @salsify/workflow-ui package is a microfrontend that is deployed independently.

name: Salsify Workflow Addon
description: An Ember addon providing support for workflow-related development. Includes the WorkflowBulkOperations service for bulk task operations such as reassigning tasks, closing tasks, completing tasks, and adding entities to workflows. Triggers events like WORKFLOW_TASKS_REASSIGNED_EVENT, WORKFLOW_TASKS_CLOSED_EVENT, WORKFLOW_TASKS_COMPLETED_EVENT, and WORKFLOW_CREATED_EVENT.

name: Salsify Workflow UI Microfrontend
description: A frontend microfrontend application for Workflow. Deployed independently and stays at version 0.0.0. Supports the unified GraphQL API powered by GraphQL Gateway. Runs locally at http://localhost:6500/shell-host/workflow-ui or integrated with Salsify UI via dandelion.

name: Salsify Workflow Task Runtime
description: An Ember addon providing the WorkflowTaskRuntime service with methods and eventing related to runtime tasks. Manages active task state, task sidebar visibility, and task URL generation. Provides utilities for integrating with host applications including query parameter synchronization and task sidebar rendering.

name: Salsify Workflow Exclaim Components
description: A collection of Exclaim components for workflow. Exclaim is Salsify's declarative UI component system built on Ember (see ember-exclaim).

name: Workflow Bulk Operations Service
description: An Ember service in the @salsify/workflow package that provides methods for bulk task operations including reassignTasks, closeTasks, completeTasks, and addToWorkflow. Uses Ember Evented to trigger events when tasks are reassigned, closed, completed, or workflows are created.

name: Workflow Task Runtime Service
description: An Ember service in the @salsify/workflow-task-runtime package that manages runtime task state. Provides getters/setters for activeTaskId and activeTaskParams, methods for showing/hiding the task sidebar, and utilities for serializing/deserializing task parameters. Triggers events like task:closed, task:completed, and task:reassigned.

name: Task Sidebar Component
description: A UI component from the @salsify/workflow-task-runtime package that displays task details in a sidebar. Host applications conditionally render this component based on the workflowTaskRuntime.shouldDisplayTaskSidebar property.
